title: ninnuvinAga mari
sahitya:
ninnuvinAga mari dikkevarunnAru nikhilalOka jananI nannu brOcuTaku


anupallavi

  pannaga bhUSaNuDaina kAnci EkAmrapati manOhAriNI shrI kAmAkSI


caraNam 1    parama lOpulanu pogaDi pogaDi yati pAmaruDai tirigi tirigi vEsAri 
sthiramulEka ati capaluDaiti nA cinta dIrci vEvEgamE brOcuTaku
    caraNam 2    ilalu nIvalane gadA nI mahimayentani yOjimpa evvari taramu 
palukaga vashamA AdishESanukainanu patita pAvani nannu brOcuTaku
    caraNam 3    tAmasamiTula sEyarAdikanu talli nA moravinarAdA dayalEdA 
kAmitArtha phaladAyakI lalitA shyAmakrSNa sOdarI brOcuTaku
